messages.subject: Re: Looking for some Williamsburg, VA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Julie...We moved to WMBRG about 7 years ago...and we love what the community and location have to offer. But, alas we seem to be the sole unschoolers in a
messages.messageBody:
Hi Julie...We moved to WMBRG about 7 years ago...and we love what the
community and location have to offer. But, alas we seem to be the
sole unschoolers in a sea of School at Homers LOL... and I started
the yahoo group in hopes of meeting more/any of our kind...so far no
takers. But Hey I'll take visting unschoolers...let me know next
time you're planning on visiting...maybe we can get our kids
together. I see you're in NC are you planning on attending the Live
and Learn conference? I'm really looking forward to it!

Elisabeth, mom to Liv(9) and Lex(7)

wrote:

and

now

> Julie M

> Tyler 6.8.7

messages.subject: Re: Looking for some Williamsburg, VA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say hi!  I don t live in Wmsbg now, but I was born and raised there, graduated high school in 1989, and did my undergrad at W&M.  Still have
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to say hi! I don't live in Wmsbg now, but I was born and
raised there, graduated high school in 1989, and did my undergrad at
W&M. Still have family there and visit several times a year. I now
live in Raleigh, NC. Glad to see some progressiveness in the old
home town ;)
Julie M
James 9.9.5
Tyler 6.8.7

messages.subject: Looking for some Williamsburg, VA unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: No curiculm required! If you live in the Williamsburg, VA area and are life learners; radial unschoolers; a big fan of John Holt and marvel in your
messages.messageBody:
No curiculm required! If you live in the Williamsburg, VA area and are
life learners; radial unschoolers; a big fan of John Holt and marvel in
your child/dren's natural learning; practice attacted and joyfull
parenting: and you want to find others that parent/live like
you....then this is the group for you!

www.WilliamsburgUnschoolers@yahoogroups.com
